Public Remarks: Property is owned by REALTORs. This nice riverfront 2-acre property on Salmon River is very private. Great for camping on as the Salmon River is nice, clean water.

Public Remarks: This building lot is very close to Richbar Nursery and their golf course. Excellent, level lot for a trailer. Seller will be receptive to taking a trade in as part payment - a boat, trailer, what do you have? Make an offer.

One acre building lot in central Kitwanga. Located beside Centennial Park. Mixed use allows residential and various low traffic commercial and institutional uses. Previous dwelling removed. 12 foot shallow well was filled in but a new one could be established. Septic system still there, connection would be subject to approval by an on site sewage specialist.

Public Remarks: Hummingbird Estates Phase 2 features 25 1/4 acre lots in a 10 acre gated community 4 miles from the Caribbean sea and beautiful sandy beaches situated in a small village. With municipal water and electricity accessible, good cell & internet reception, regional hospital 5 minutes away, regional airport 10 minutes and probably the best shopping outside Belize City, paved Hummingbird Hwy 800 feet from the subdivision, with local or express bus service. There are currently no building restrictions other than the usual government restriction for setback and building permit from the building. $22,000 USD per lot with vendor financing available. Call or email for more information.

Treed 108 Mile Ranch building lot, close to golf course, 108 Mile Lake and the trails around the lake and Walker Valley. Treed 108 Mile ranch building lot, close to golf course, 108 Mile Lake and the trails around the lake and Walker Valley. Level, well treed 0.56 acre lot close to Deka Lake. Great spot to create a recreational getaway and take advantage of the massive trail system and great fishing this area is known for. Nice 0.41 acre lot backing onto the beautiful Buck Creek and walking trail. Great spot to build or set up a modular! Shallow well, a variety of trees. Private, quiet location, yet within walking distance to all amenities!

Beautiful, flat lot in popular neighbourhood. Come and build your dream home in Quesnel just minutes away from everything!  Close to downtown, the University, elementary and high schools, shopping...an ideal locale. These lots are disappearing.

Large building lot overlooking McLeese Lake, with tons of potential. Accessible along Highway 97, close to the General Store. Beautiful building site, with lake view or for use as a recreational property. Only about 15 minutes from Gibraltar Mine.

Bring your RV and enjoy the history and views of Hendrix Lake from these 3 adjoining lots. Just over an hour from 100 Mile House with access to Crown land and miles of trails. Hydro and telephone at lot line    L#8524

Public Remarks: AVAIL!!! A great home for first-time buyers! Why pay rent when you can own? This lovely place has its own fenced yard, storage, and parking. 2 bedrooms and 1 bath with updated kitchen and bathroom. The bathroom has double sinks, so no fighting over mirrors, sinks, or counter space. The kitchen has gorgeous backsplash. PLUS + for any investors, Peace Country MHP allows pets (cats and dogs) AND allows you to rent-out if you so choose. CMHC and banks still take upgrades as an extension of mobile life and mortgage term extension (upgrades like: roof, furnace, windows, etc). This home is move-in ready, you just need to come and take a look! Substantially rebuilt-newer windows & new peaked insulated roof, siding, furnace, complete new bathroom & kitchen all in 2013.

Public Remarks: Are you looking for a getaway? This lot may be just what you are looking for, located within walking distance of and only 2 blocks from Lakelse Lake. Creek runs through property.

Public Remarks: View lot with some trees. Partly sloped. Quiet neighbourhood with nice homes, almost at the end of a cul-de-sac. Golf course and all amenities close by. Just a mile off Highway 97 is this well treed and level 10 acres. Build your home or just enjoy the abundance of wildlife. L#7921

Small acreage (3.85) close to Cluculz Creek along short trail over Crown land. Launch your canoe/kayak close to home. Property has a septic system (permits available) as per seller, shallow well (quality/quantity of water not known), hydro, telephone near property line. Relatively level, offers good building sites or place a modular home. Some usable outbuildings. Well treed for privacy, paved road, school bus service. Easy 40 minutes to Prince George.

Estate sale. Approx. 10 minutes to downtown Prince George. Beautiful 4.15 acres to build your dream home on. Pineview area & close to Elementary School. Zoned for residential use, agricultural or home based business. Private, rural setting, but not far from the city.

Public Remarks: Bright and beautifully kept home in the scenic and quiet village of Granisle. This wonderful 3 bedroom home has large, spacious rooms. This home has had many recent upgrades, including a new electric furnace in 2013, twin sealed vinyl windows in 2009, a newer pellet stove, freshly painted walls, new blinds, and new flooring in the living room, kitchen, and master bedroom. This home has been well looked after and the yard is nicely landscaped with strawberry plants, a Saskatoon bush, and flowerbeds. Two storage sheds in the backyard. Newer appliances: refrigerator, stove, washer, and dryer included.
Realtor Remarks: Foundation is blocking.

Public Remarks: Located in an established residential area within easy walking distance to Conrad Street Elementary School and a stone's throw from the very popular Maverick Mart neighbourhood supermarket. This level 79.8x100 (7,980 sq ft) R-2 zoned site is looking for a home!

'Absolutely adorable' best describe this mobile with addition, situated on a double pad in one of the best locations in the park. This home boasts ownership pride throughout, and has been updated with windows, metal roof, and vinyl siding with extra insulation (making the heating costs minimal). Addition includes cozy foyer and second bedroom. Outside is an oasis, which includes a nice getaway in the gazebo out back. Little shop for him to tinker in and a nice greenhouse and garden for her to putter in. Several fruit trees and berry bushes, and established trees and shrubs, make this place inviting. Take a look...you won't be disappointed.

Realistic value in this 1996 model-year home. 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom on the main floor, split-level entry and a full, unfinished basement. This house has a concrete foundation, metal roof and vinyl siding and windows. It's located on Highway 16...extremely convenient for those wanting to be close to the downtown core. This house will require paint and flooring, but it certainly has good bones! A great revenue property or starter home. Call today for an appointment to view.

Public Remarks: Located at the end of Millard Rd. This property may have some residual timber values. The area is heavily populated with deer and moose. Would make a great hunting camp.

Located on a quiet cul-de-sac at Deka Lake, very close to water access, this 0.61 acre has driveway and cleared area located on the corner of Cotterpin and Gauthier Roads. The lot is completely level and easy to build on, and provides both North and West exposure for maximum sunshine, and a nice open feeling with just the right amount of trees. Deka Lake is one of the most popular locations in the area known as Fishing Highway 24, with Interlakes shopping area just 15 minutes away, and 100 Mile House 40 minutes away. Bring up your camper and begin enjoying today. L#8820

Less than 5 minutes to town this south exposed lot is just what you have been waiting for! This property is perfect for a small hobby farm or to give you some extra space. Good wells in the area. Driveway is in. GST is applicable. L#8487

A rare find. Large 1.61-acre waterfront lot on beautiful Bouchie Lake, just a 10-minute drive west of Quesnel. Great building sites with beautiful views and lots of wildlife. The property is level with some trees. Natural gas and hydro available. Adjoining lots also for sale and can be purchased as a group.

Beautiful 14x66 ft mobile home with large addition and sundeck with a very nicely landscaped bay with storage shed & mix of trees. Nice view of Williams Lake. Interior very tastefully redecorated with updated colour scheme and flooring. Natural gas fireplace in living rm. Central air. Low utility costs average Hydro $80 per month & natural gas $25. Seller absent but heat turned down when not at home. Vinyl windows. Washer, dryer, fridge, stove and all window coverings negotiable.
Realtor Remarks: Foundation is wooden blocks.

Public Remarks: The Roosevelt Apartments are centrally located and situated on a very sunny, southwestern-facing, prime hilltop site. Immediately adjacent to the Prince Rupert Regional Hospital, this complex has always been sought-after residence for hospital staff. Offered for sale in this 45 unit complex, this 3 bedroom, second floor unit is presently tenant-occupied. The exteriors of all four buildings in the complex were upgraded in 2012 with new siding and windows. The cost of these upgrades was approximately $2,680,000.000.  This is a great opportunity to enter into a positive real estate investment located in the growing port of Prince Rupert.

Live your dream and escape to the country! This amazing 16.48 acre property has a lovely mix of trees with walking trails throughout. It is relatively flat with a gentle south to southwesterly slope; has easy access with road frontage on 2 sides; hydro and telephone runs along the road; and the McBride Timber Rd is seal-topped from the highway - approx 4.4 kms. The zoning is SH - small holdings, allowing a minimum lot area of 6 ha (14.8 acres) and is not in the ALR. The permitted uses also include: home-craft, home occupation and secondary suite. Make this your own personal playground, where you have easy access to the back country and numerous nearby lakes. Create your lifestyle and invest in your future!
Realtor Remarks: **A 25% introduction fee will be deducted from the Buyer Brokerage's commission and paid to the Listing Brokerage if the Listing Agent introduces or shows the property first by way of a personal appointment. The Seller is a non-registrant, and will not be collecting GST in on this transaction.

Public Remarks: Why rent? This two bedroom mobile home is steps to the beach in the Bonniebrook Mobile Home Park. A great place to live full time, or have as a get-away to the beautiful Sunshine Coast. The lot is larger than most with some well thought out landscaping and a large covered deck. Adult oriented, no rentals and pet restrictions. Great value.

Public Remarks: Build your dream home here! Beautiful 4.905 acre building site located within a ten minute drive to Smithers. Property is treed and features an existing shallow well.

Perfect cabin for the outdoor enthusiast. The lake is just steps from your door...lots of fishing and hunting in the area. Perfect for quading, dirt-biking and snowmobiling! Get away from the busy city and relax with the peaceful scenery of Hendrix Lake.

Lovely 0.86/acre waterfront lot on beautiful Bouchie Lake, just a 10-minute drive west of Quesnel. Property is level with some trees. Beautiful views and lots of wildlife, including pelicans. Natural gas and hydro available. Adjoining lots also for sale and can be purchased as a group.

Own your own piece of Chilcotin paradise! 2 lots equaling 11+ acres with old log cabin straddling the 2 lots' centre line. Beautiful setting on Alexis Lake. No motors allowed on lake to keep everything nice and quiet! Live the Western Chilcotin dream on this nice low-bank waterfront property. They're not making waterfront properties like this anymore!

Driving instructions: West on Highway 20 past Alexis Creek (approx. 2hr) West of Williams Lake, through Bull Canyon, right at Alexis Crk-Nazko Road (Alexis Creek refuse site), then 25km (approx. 30min) dirt road.

Public Remarks: Over 6 acres with lake views! Buy and build your dream home overlooking beautiful Lac La Hache. L#7668

This area has so much to offer where one can enjoy the full 4 seasons, from quadding, snowmobiling, ice fishing, riding and hiking trails, and some great fishing too! Spend your summer on your new beach at Anderson Lake, with this boat access property only a 10 minutes ride from the launch. Beautiful mix of pasture and trees on the 10-acre property with Fawn Creek flowing through, as well as a natural spring. The property is fully fenced with a driveway in, and has a 28x24 barn perfect for hay storage and horses. Don't miss out on this little piece of paradise.

This unit has an in-suite laundry, a large flex area that could be used for storage and/or a single mattress to squeeze in an additional person. Located on the top floor directly above Earl's you have a great view of the Village and Mountains and it's walking distance to great restaurants and the lifts.
